<h3 id="X35781">X(35781) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER  OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd AURIGA AND 2nd KENMOTU-FREE-VERTICES</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(-4*(-2*S*a-a^3+2*(b+c)*a^2+(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))*S*sqrt(R*(4*R+r))+8*S^2*(-a+b+c)*a)  :  :
<p>X(35781) lies on these lines:
{6,11875}, {55,35642}, {371,5597}, {372,11252}, {486,5601}, {1482,35780}, {3071,32146}, {5598,35811}, {5599,10577}, {6396,11822}, {6420,19007}, {6561,11843}, {6564,8196}, {6565,8200}, {8186,35775}, {8190,35777}, {8197,35789}, {8198,35795}, {8199,35793}, {8201,35807}, {8202,35805}, {8207,35842}, {9834,35821}, {11207,35823}, {11366,35763}, {11384,35765}, {11492,35773}, {11493,35785}, {11837,35767}, {11861,35783}, {11863,35791}, {11865,35797}, {11867,35799}, {11869,35801}, {11871,35803}, {11873,35809}, {11877,35808}, {11879,35768}, {11881,35817}, {11883,35819}, {12179,35825}, {12345,35699}, {12365,35827}, {12376,13208}, {12415,35837}, {12452,35841}, {12454,35843}, {12456,35845}, {12458,35611}, {12460,35853}, {12462,35857}, {12464,35863}, {12466,35835}, {12468,35865}, {12470,35851}, {12472,35754}, {12474,35867}, {12476,35869}, {12478,35829}, {12480,12971}, {12482,35871}, {12484,35833}, {12486,35831}, {13176,35879}, {13228,35883}, {13229,35881}, {13682,35873}, {13802,35875}, {13890,35815}, {13944,35813}, {16121,35855}, {18495,35787}, {18955,35769}, {19008,35771}, {22668,35839}, {22669,35849}, {22670,35847}, {22671,35861}, {32265,35877}, {32360,35859}</p>
